import "./Form.css"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const getTransactionDetails = () => { const storeDetails = localStorage.getItem("transactionForm"); if (!storeDetails) return { transactionDate: "", monthYear: "", transactionType: "", fromAccount: "", toAccount: "", transactionAmount: "", receipt: "", notes: "", }; return JSON.stringify(storeDetails); }; const TransactonForm = () => { const [details, setDetails] = useState({getTransactionDetails}); useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem("transactionForm", JSON.stringify(details)); }, [details]); const hasChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; console.log(name, value); setDetails((prev) => { return { ...prev, [name]: value }; }); }; console.log(details); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.target); }; return ( <>














); }; export default TransactonForm;
